title: The Shadow Medical Community Behind the Attempt to Ban Medication Abortion
description:
Anti-abortion groups orchestrated their legal challenge to wind up before far-right Judge Matthew Kacsmaryk.

The post The Shadow Medical Community Behind the Attempt to Ban Medication Abortion appeared first on The Intercept.

title: How to Save Yellowstone's Wolves
description:
Biologist Doug Smith looks back on a quarter century leading one of the most historic and controversial government conservation initiatives of all time.

The post How to Save Yellowstone’s Wolves appeared first on The Intercept.
